channel.title: Brainfart regarding Online-game-distribution-services
channel.description: I'm trying to find articles pertaining the rise and development of such services as Steam and (to a lesser extent) Direct2Drive, and any online-game-downloading services. Problem is, my google-sense isn't letting me make searches that yield anything useful. Any help, maybe even a pointer to a successful google search?
